title: Stream: Two Door Cinema Club – Beacon
body:
Having made the crossover between NME adored indie act to mainstream commercial success, **Two Door Cinema Club’s** sophomore LP **_Beacon_** is one of 2012 most anticipated records.

Recorded in Los Angeles with Jacknife Lee (U2, Snow Patrol, Bloc Party), the first single from the album, _Sleep Alone_ was released at the tail end of July. Despite not being out for another month (3 September), the trio comprised of **Alex Trimble**, **Kevin Baird** and **Sam Halliday** have made **_Beacon_** available to stream in it’s entirety, presumably due to the record leaking onto to the internet.

Recorded in Los Angeles with Jacknife Lee (U2, Snow Patrol, Bloc Party), the first single from the album, Sleep Alone was released at the tail end of July. \[…\]
